headline: 2.0 alpha test begins
summary: Learn about the first stage of testing for the new ProHits-viz interface.

headline: GIX browser extension released
summary: Quickly retreive gene information at ProHits-viz using the GIX browser extension.

headline: 2.0 beta test of dot plot and correlation tools
summary: Learn about the next stage of testing for the new ProHits-viz interface.

headline: 2.0 beta test of scatter plot tools
summary: Scatter plot analysis, with a new interactive viewer, is now live.

headline: New tool for single condition visualization
summary: The SCV tool for visualizing data on a single condition (e.g. bait, experiment) is now available.
